data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Hải Dương to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hải Dương, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Hải Dương. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Hải Dương, Vietnam to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Hải Dương, Vietnam a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Alu people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Alu people know you.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Hải Dương, Vietnam. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, it’s possible most of the 1,525,342 lost people in  Hải Dương, Vietnam have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Hải Dương, Vietnam that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.
